## Summary
- What changed?
- Why is this needed?

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests added/updated (if applicable)
- [ ] `go test ./...` passes locally
- [ ] Docs updated (README/docs/api-reference) if behavior changed
- [ ] No breaking changes, or they are clearly documented

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] CI/Build

## Validation
- Commands run:
  - `go test ./...`
  - `go build ./...`

## Notes for reviewers
- Any edge cases, trade-offs, or follow-ups
